ISSUE.TITLE: Can't able to Edit display order and delete product from category edit product panel
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.30 beta Steps to reproduce the problem: 1) Go Admin/Category/Edit/13 and chose advance mode. 2) Go Products panel and Edit and change display order and save not working edit functionality 3) And try to delete any record from grid also not working

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: #4444 Code refactoring of the reward points system
